sys_relationship.name: Installed CIs in network

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_relationship"><sys_relationship action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><advanced>false</advanced><apply_to/><basic_apply_to>x_8302_insubnet_network</basic_apply_to><basic_query_from>cmdb_ci_hardware</basic_query_from><insert_callback/><name>Installed CIs in network</name><query_from/><query_with><![CDATA[(function refineQuery(current, parent) {

	// Add your code here, such as current.addQuery(field, value);
	var range = parent.range;
	var ips = new inSubnetFunctions().getIPsFromRange(range);
	current.addEncodedQuery('ip_addressIN'+ips+'^install_status=1');

})(current, parent);]]></query_with><reference_field>change_control</reference_field><related_list/><simple_reference>false</simple_reference><sys_class_name>sys_relationship</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-10-09 15:18:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>aaef7e34dbb31010f928273748961951</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Installed CIs in network</sys_name><sys_package display_value="inSubnet" source="x_8302_insubnet">80d913ffdb231010f9282737489619ea</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="inSubnet">80d913ffdb231010f9282737489619ea</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_relationship_aaef7e34dbb31010f928273748961951</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-10-09 15:24:04</sys_updated_on></sys_relationship><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=aaef7e34dbb31010f928273748961951"/></record_update>
